nodes.text: Dumerin was a male Chagrian major of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY he asked a Republic citizen to destroy Imperial turrets and the maintenance droids repairing them.
Major Dumerin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Ilum and begins the mission "Icy Destruction."
